Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant with water and light, showing it growing and looking healthy.
The student can draw a plant without water, showing it wilting or not growing well.
The student can draw a plant without light, showing it wilting or not growing well.
The student can draw differences in the plant's appearance in the presence and absence of water.
The student can draw differences in the plant's appearance in the presence and absence of light.
